summary:
Changes game settings so that your stats always regen at 100%, even in combat.
Health, magicka, and stamina will all regen in combat just like they do out of combat.
descriptionHtml:
Health, magicka, and stamina will all regen in combat just like they do out of combat.

In vanilla:
In combat, basic stats(health, magic, and stamina) regen 70% of what they regen out of combat.

With Improved Combat Regen:
In combat, basic stats(health, magic, and stamina) regen 100% of what they regen out of combat.


You might also like:

Improved Armor Formula
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15860
author: Troy1010
